mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.plugin.visibility

Class AdaptorProxyFieldLevelVisibilityHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.plugin.visibility.AdaptorProxyFieldLevelVisibilityHandler
  • Type Parameters:
    CommonIndexValue -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldVisibilityHandler<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature,Object>

    public class AdaptorProxyFieldLevelVisibilityHandler
extends Object
implements FieldVisibilityHandler<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature,Object>
    Works with VisibilityManagement instance to define the visibility for a specific field of a data row object. Performs the same function as FieldLevelVisibiltyHandler. However, this class is linked directly to a FeatureDataAdapter. The setup of the handlers in FeatureDataAdapter occurs prior to the resolution of the VisibilityManagement. Referencing the FeatureDataAdapter removes the initialization order constraint.

    • Constructor Summary

      AdaptorProxyFieldLevelVisibilityHandler(String fieldName, FeatureDataAdapter adapter)
      Used when acting with an Index adaptor as a visibility handler.
